Posts.Content: Thank you for your quick reply. Yes they took biopsies and US. Just waiting for the results soon. The whole situation was just very odd and it’s got us very worried.
Posts.Title: Girlfriend has been told she has a mammogram result of M5

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply! It was all a whirlwind and we didn’t really ask any questions. The ultrasound showed she had thickening of a lymph node and they did a fine needle aspiration. Again what does this mean about spread, they said it was small, but does that mean it’s already spread to the lymph node or is it a routine test to see if there is any spread?
Posts.Title: Girlfriend has been told she has a mammogram result of M5

Posts.Content: thank you for this information. Its hard to focus on anything else right now. It seems from the report she has 2 small tumours. From my research this is classed as multi-focal. Would you have any idea of the significance of multiple small tumours vs one. Is this seen as more aggressive and does it affect prognosis.
Posts.Title: Girlfriend has been told she has a mammogram result of M5

Posts.Content: Hi, so basically my girlfriend who is less then 30 has been told she has a mammogram result of M5 which from what I understand is malignant. We are awaiting histology. I was wondering 1) How accurate are mammogram results?  2) does this nexessarily mean it’s an aggressive tumour and has already spread?
Posts.Title: Girlfriend has been told she has a mammogram result of M5
